title: New Ratchet & Clank Details, Apex Legends Mode - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.26.21
description:
Head to http://www.CFBBoxBreaks.com now and use code KINDAFUNNY to get 5% Off Your First Break!

Go to http://drsquatch.com and use code dsckfgd for 20% off on orders of $20 or more!

Go to http://sqex.link/remakeKF to pre-order Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade today!

Download the Caviar App and use offer code KINDAFUNNY to get $10 off an order of $20 or more.

Blessing and Tim kick off the week by talking about Rivet, Ratchet and Clank Rift Apart's new Lombax, and a new mode for Apex Legends Legacy.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:15 - Housekeeping
PS I Love You XOXO this week is being pushed from Tuesday and is going up later in the week. There will be no Patreon live recording for that one. Be on the lookout for it when it drops.
Kinda Funny Xcast went up over the weekend. They talk all about Battlefield and have on LordCognito as a guest. You can catch that everywhere you normally do.
As a reminder: Returnal First Impressions are up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
In case you missed it:
Kinda Funny Podcast went up over the weekend and apparently they’re ranking the planets and the members of NSYNC
Falcon and The Winter Soldier finale reactions went up over the weekend.
Mortal Kombat in review also went up. Youtube.com/KindaFunny
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Tom Bock, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report   -
00:06:10 - Ratchet and Clank: Rift Apart got a new trailer - Alyssa Mercante @ GamesRadar
00:13:45 - Why not wait until next week to celebrate Ratchet and Clank? - Best Friends Q:Luciddre4m
00:18:20 - Apex Legends adds a new permanent mode - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:24:55 - Respawn Studios won an oscar last night - Danielle Partis @ GIBiz
00:27:54 - Speaking of Respawn: It looks like they’re working on a new IP - Twitter
00:30:38 -  Ad
00:37:00 - The Last Of Us HBO show has its directors - Denise Petski @ Deadline
00:39:25 - Humble Bundle limits charity donations to 15% - Danielle Partis @ GiBiz
00:44:08 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:47:30 - Which indies are you expecting to appear for this unique state of play? - Witt
00:51:00 - Squad Up:Gage Luke(Twitter & Xbox) - LukeShot1st
00:51:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Whitta

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

definitely can help them uh in terms of awareness and then in terms of you know stickiness of actually getting people to buy and try out a game that they wouldn't necessarily try out just because it's a playstation studios title tim let's move on to story number two apex legends adds a new permanent mode this comes from matt purslow at ign the upcoming season of apex legends legacy is set to add a new permanent 3v3 game mode called arenas arenas is not a battle royale but is instead a multi-round 3v3 mode with similarities to games like valorant and counter-strike players fight on maps much smaller than those used for the battle royale and have just one life per round to outplay the other team conclusive games can be over in three rounds but a match can go as far as nine rounds and into sudden death if teams are unable to outsmart outsmart their opponents while you will while you use the same weapons and characters as we do uh in the main apex legends battle royale mode arenas is a

sudden death if teams are unable to outsmart outsmart their opponents while you will while you use the same weapons and characters as we do uh in the main apex legends battle royale mode arenas is a very different looking game type for starters there is no looting at all instead a shopping phase before each round will allow players to purchase weapons consumables and upgrades you can also purchase character abilities to keep the characters balanced for this for this mode you'll have to buy charges of their tactical and ultimate abilities in this phase rather than the battle royale's cooldown system currency for this store is provided at the start of every round with bonuses awarded for kills and wins much like in other tactical pvp shooters player equipment is reset at the start of each round to prevent power snowballing and keep matches to a swift average of 15 minutes when arenas launches it will have two bespoke maps party crasher set on a ship that's crashed into a downtown plaza

weird and trying to do different things within the world within the the the playset the toy bucket they have of um this battle royale world that they made and this free-to-play idea they're like okay cool how do we change this so it's not just battle royale how do we add more modes and it reminds me a lot of things like rocket league and so many games that have kind of become platforms over the years and kind of just become synonymous with like video games and it's just like there are these like almost sports that happen alongside like the big tentpole releases where cool there's a lot of games that come out and have their their moments maybe their week or two here and there but there's also constantly these games that are just ever present that people can jump into and i like the idea of even within those games there being a suite of different games but you do need to kind of build that up it can't just be like here's a bunch of different modes we're just going to see what sticks i
